plot: A lovesick skeleton takes a trip through the afterlife. On this surreal journey he struggles with love,loss,and confusion. He comes out on the other side with a true understanding of dust to dust.
title: Lost in Found
plot_es: A lovesick skeleton takes a trip through the afterlife. On this surreal journey he struggles with love,loss,and confusion. He comes out on the other side with a true understanding of dust to dust.
